entry.title: "A Transaction Fee Market Exists Without a Block Size Limit"--new research paper suggests
entry.summary: The context highlights the need for caution when conducting research, especially in a politically charged field where billions are at stake. Researchers are advised to seek expert opinions before publishing widely if they wish to avoid controversy. However, there are some developers who may lack knowledge or experience beyond Bitcoin and exhibit immature behavior. The post also suggests that rants and attacks by individuals such as Todd and Garzik should be posted on personal blogs or Reddit rather than on official mailing lists. Lastly, it is mentioned that toxic conduct can be harmful to development mailing list discussions and a waste of time.
